name: Space Shooter Pro Redux
description:
A 2D space shooter playable on PC that is similar to classic retro arcade games like Galaga. 

Built through out GameDev HQ 2D Game Development Course, this game is the capstone of the course. I developed all gaming mechanics from scratch, using C# and Unity3D. This includes all features from player movement, enemies, spawn managers, powers, speed boosts, powers, effects, menus, UI, and more.
